method.help: Type of screening used. **simple** for a constant dielectric constant, **distdep** for a distance-dependent screening. In the latter case screening length must be specified

epsilon.help: Relative dielectric constant of the semiconductor

screening.help: Screening length used in the distance-dependent screening

cutoff.help: Cutoff for Coulomb interactions for molecular centers of mass. If ommited, the whole box is used
